channel.title: Ubuntu Korea Community
channel.description: Recent content on Ubuntu Korea Community

item.title: UbuCon Korea 2024
item.description: Following the success of last year’s UbuCon Korea, UbuCon Korea will be held at Aug 10th at Microsoft Korea. With the theme “Deploy with Ubuntu”

item.title: Ubuntu 24.04
item.description: Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat is the latest LTS version released in April 2024. You can get it today, and run it on various environments such as Desktop, Servers, IoT, Cloud and much more.

item.title: Download Ubuntu
item.description: Version and system requirements Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, the latest LTS(Long term support) version provides 5 years of maintenance and security updates for free. In most cases, LTS version is recommended for stable use. See Ubuntu 22.04 LTS release notes (Korean translation) See Ubuntu 22.04 LTS release notes Ubuntu 23.10 If you want to try out latest features, Try out Ubuntu 23.10, the latest version. It provides 9 months of maintenance and security updates for free.
